items.name: Tour of the Grand Canyon
items.description: Explore the magnificent Grand Canyon with our expert guides. This tour includes hiking, rafting, and scenic viewpoints.

items.name: Safari in Africa
items.description: Experience the wildlife and beauty of Africa on our guided safari tours. Witness the Big Five in their natural habitat.

items.name: City Tour of Paris
items.description: Discover the charm and history of Paris with our city tour. Visit the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and enjoy a Seine River cruise.
